testsuite.name: new book entry
testsuite.system-out:
Feature: new book entry As a book owner I want to add books I own to the book tracker so that I do not have to remember them by myself
--Output from new book-- Scenario: new book # NewBook.feature:6 Given I open the book tracker # Book_Steps.groovy:5 When I add "Specification by Example" # Book_Steps.groovy:10 Then I see "Specification by Example"s details # Book_Steps.groovy:14
